channel.title: How Do I Change The Shop Prices?
channel.description:
On My server my barrows, weps, etc. are too low of a price. So I want to change the prices. I heard that you change them with some sort of percent er somthing. Which file do I open ad where Do I go to? Help is highly apprieciated.
Thanks, Play For Keeps

item.title: How Do I Change The Shop Prices?

which number is the shop price?

Read full topic

item.title: How Do I Change The Shop Prices?
item.dc:creator: @Tredog Tredog
item.description:
@Tredog wrote:

go into shops cfg file by opening it with notepad and ull se sumtin like this
@gre@Weapons_And_Jewels_Shop 2 2 1731 1000 1725 1000 1729 1000 1478 1000 1727 1000 1692 1000 6585 1000 1704 1000 6731 1000 6733 1000 6737 1000 6735 1000
^ ^
this is the iteam this is price

Read full topic
